hero.heading: All our kittens, cats and males

kittens.title: Ragdoll kittens
kittens.description: Vaccination, deworming, pedigree, purchase contract... this is a matter of course, we are in contact with the owners of our kittens even after the sale. The parents are negatively tested for HCM and PKD, FeLV and FIV.

litters.noLitters: We currently don't have any litters

facts.heading: Some facts about our Ragdoll breeding

contact.heading: I'm interested in a kitten
contact.subtext: If you are interested in purchasing one of our kittens, please contact us by phone or using the form below.

upcomingLitters.title: Upcoming Litters
upcomingLitters.description: We're excited to share our planned litters. Contact us to reserve a kitten from these upcoming litters.

currentLitters.title: Current Litters
currentLitters.description: Browse through our current litters to see our beautiful kittens.

pastLitters.title: Past Litters
pastLitters.description: Browse through our previous litters to see the beautiful kittens we've produced.
